sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Form.css"; const Form = () => { const [patientData, setPatientData] = useState({ HN: "", name: "", surname: "", gender: "", DOB: "", prefix: "", }); const [recordData, setRecordData] = useState({ BT: "", BP: "", HR: "", RR: "", O2sat: "", consciousness: "", breathing: "", foodIntake: "", foodType: "", eating: "", sleep: "", bowel: "", additionalNotes: "", }); const handleHNChange = async (e) => { const HN = e.target.value; setPatientData({ ...patientData, HN }); if (HN.length === 7) { try { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/v1/patients/get?HN=${HN}`, { method: "GET", headers: { "Accept": "application/json", }, }); if (response.ok) { const data = await response.json(); setPatientData({ HN: data.HN, name: data.name, surname: data.surname, gender: data.gender, DOB: data.DOB, prefix: data.prefix, }); } else { console.error("Failed to fetch patient data"); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching patient data:", error); } } }; const handleRecordChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setRecordData({ ...recordData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/v1/patients/record', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'text/plain', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(recordData), }); if (response.ok) { alert("Record saved successfully!"); // Optionally clear form or handle post-submit logic } else { console.error("Failed to save record"); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving record:", error); } }; return (
{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
